Should we close this if it is not active, and track it in JIRA instead, which can link back to the closed PR? Or, alternatively, can it be merged to a feature branch?
Should we close this if it is not active, and track it in JIRA instead, which can link back to the closed PR?

My bad. I've reverted most of the formatting changes that I could see, and I'll merge once Apex ROS turns green again, or ping you if it turns out I've missed something.

Thanks!
Run Apex RunnableOnService
ok with me
Closing, I will track in JIRA explaining ALL considerations to be taken if we would want to enable support for Spark 2.x
Status (particularly in the light of the first stable release)?
Should we close this if the resolution is to try doing something else here?
Perhaps we should close in light of the more general approach suggested in the JIRA?
Still blocked on something within Snappy, though we also exclude it. Someone should pick this back up and push it over the finish line.

+1 to close
retest this please.

This seems like a lot to take for the first stable release. Perhaps we should target this for the first release after that one. What we should do now is the refactoring of `Bound` with this in mind, so this can be done nicely and compatibly.
Is this ready for review? Perhaps assign a reviewer?
Any ideas how to move this forward?
Is this ready for review? Perhaps assign a reviewer?
